Recipe: The AUB special

Ingredients:
- White rice, 250g
- Canned kidney beans, 200g 
- Sriracha sauce, 1-2 tbsp
- Tomato sauce, 125g
- Ketchup, 30g
- Sunflower seeds, 80g
- Black pepper 

Instructions:
Boil about 500ml of water with 1 tbsp of salt. Add your rice and wait 10-15 minutes for the rice to cook. Extract the water from the rice and then add all of your other ingredients.

Total calories: 1715
